modName: The Witcher 2 - HD Retexture of Craftable Seltkirk Armor
summary: The Witcher 2 - HD Retexture of Craftable Seltkirk Armor
descriptionHtml:
[color=burlywood 2][font=comic sans ms][size=6][b][i][u]My new armor version 1.04[/u][/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2997846-1336806550.jpg[/img]
[color=burlywood 2][font=comic sans ms][size=6][b][i][u]Suhoi72 retexture version 1.04[/u][/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2997846-1335559859.jpg[/img]


[color=burlywood 2][font=comic sans ms][size=6][b][i][u]RETEXTURE of SELTKIRK ARMOR
by geraltdirivia & Suhoi72 [/u][/i][/b][/size][/font][/color]

V1.04 Currently this is the new version based on LordOfWar new pack of The Witcher 2 models, each folder contains a readme with all the information needed to install the mod. I hope you like it, don't forget to endorse please. ;);)

V1.03 This is the new version made by Suhoi72 who gave me the permission to upload his file.

V1.02 Removed white stripes on the armor and on the pants, substituted by leather ones.

V1.01 I've added a darker retexture of the armor, boots, gloves, trousers and a new belt color!!..don't forget to endorse if you like it!!

This is a retexture I've made for myself and then I decided to share it.

First of all I'd like to thank "L0rd0fWar" for his efforts to bring Geralt's world in Skyrim, and I thank him for the permission to put this retexture of one of his better armor.

You need LOrdOfWar Seltkirk Armor file that can be find here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588

Just extract my files and copy them into Data/Texture/Armor/Geralt

Credits :

CD Projekt's (That allow modders to use their models as a resource)
LOrdOfWar
Suhoi72

If you like it just endorse :):)

Have fun.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2997846-1335963487.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2997846-1336751841.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2997846-1336075054.jpg[/img]
